description: This file defines a React functional component 'NavBar' that renders a navigation bar with links that change depending on user authentication status. It uses React Router for navigation and context for authentication state.

methods.name: NavBar()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the navigation bar, managing user login/logout display and navigation links.

methods.name: handleLogout
methods.description: Function invoked when the logout button is clicked; calls logout from AuthContext and navigates to the login page.
